content:
Automatically implemented properties cannot be used inside a type marked with StructLayout(LayoutKind.Explicit).

Auto-implemented properties have their backing fields provided by the compiler and the field is not accessible to source code. Therefore, they are not compatible with System.Runtime.InteropServices.LayoutKind.

To correct this error

  1. Make the property a regular property in which you provide the accessor bodies.

Example

The following example generates CS0842: 

// cs0842.cs  
using System;  
using System.Runtime.InteropServices;  

namespace TestNamespace  
{  
    [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Explicit)]  
    struct Str  
    {  
        public int Num // CS0842  
        {  
            get;  
            set;  
        }  

        static int Main()  
        {  
            return 1;  
        }  
    }  
}
